name: glitter
description: It is a casual puzzle game with great features and advantages. The classic gameplay uses hooks to capture various items. The game goal is very simple, to collect as much valuable things as possible within the specified time, in order to achieve the number of passes for each level (in the game, all the gains will be settled into corresponding value of money). In the game, there will be various rich items, not only treasures, but also various artifact items; Cool props allow players to embark on magnificent challenges and enjoy adventures; Classic gameplay, using hooks to capture various items and constantly increasing one's wealth.
